potatoes.name: Kerr's Pink
potatoes.description: Kerr's Pink is a potato cultivar in wide production in Ireland and the United Kingdom and many other countries. Although often quoted as an Irish potato, the cultivar was actually created by J. Henry of Cornhill, Scotland, in 1907

potatoes.name: Dore
potatoes.description: Dutch variety of potato from the province of Zeeland.

potatoes.name: Duke of York
potatoes.description: A vigorous red sport of a potato, Duke of York produces large, oval, red-skinned tubers with moist yellow flesh of superb flavour.

potatoes.name: Potato of the Year
potatoes.description: WOW, what a potato. Well-deserved win!

carrots.name: Carrot One
carrots.description: Carrot One cultivar in wide production in Ireland and the United Kingdom and many other countries. Although often quoted as an Irish carrot, the cultivar was actually created by J. Henry of Cornhill, Scotland, in 1907

carrots.name: Carrot Two
carrots.description: Dutch variety of carrot from the province of Zeeland.

carrots.name: Carrot Three
carrots.description: A vigorous red sport of a carrot, Carrot Three produces large, oval, red-skinned tubers with moist yellow flesh of superb flavour.

carrots.name: Carrot of the Year
carrots.description: WOW, what a carrot. Well-deserved win!
